title: Hour 1 – Big Ben Has Played His Last Down As A Steeler. Guest – Aditi Kinkhabwala
itunes:title: Hour 1 – Big Ben Has Played His Last Down As A Steeler. Guest – Aditi Kinkhabwala
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker sit in for Dan Patrick and explain why the Pittsburgh Steelers need to move on from Ben Roethlisberger and question if the longtime quarterback will make things easier on a franchise he’s spent his entire career with. They speak with NFL Network reporter Aditi Kinkhabwala about the organization’s plan to rebuild. Plus, the Padres ink the most electric player in baseball to a 14-year deal and debate whether or not Jalen Johnson deserves to be criticized for quitting on his Duke teammates! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
